actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the effective date of disability pension shall be the date that permanent and total disability is established, if application for such benefit is received within 1 year from such date.

summary.text: Provides that the effective date of disability pensions for veterans shall be the date that permanent and total disability is established, if application for such benefit is received within one year from such date. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 3010).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that the effective date of disability pension shall be the date that permanent and total disability is established, if application for such benefit is received within 1 year from such date.
